title: Contact
body:
If you’ve spotted something wrong, or are having trouble making Oh My Word! work for you, you can drop us a line at [support@ohmyword.xyz](mailto:support@ohmyword.xyz).

Just want to have a word? You can email us on [contact@ohmyword.xyz](contact@ohmyword.xyz) to talk about anything from your favourite words to new features you’d like to see on our app.

If you want updates on new features and releases from Oh My Word!, [sign up to our mailing list here](#subscribe).
